alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Clark; Teton (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 9:17PM MDT until July 08 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Lewis and Clark County in west central Montana... Western Teton County in north central Montana... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 917 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles northwest of Augusta, or 25 miles southwest of Choteau, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Pishkun Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
